summary: Comprehensive testing of Task Management System completed. All backend APIs (24/24 tests passed) and frontend UI features are working correctly. Tasks can be created, viewed, updated, deleted with full CRUD operations. TaskCreateButton is integrated in Orders and Customers pages. Notification bell, search, filtering, and checklist functionality all working.

Backend: GET /tasks/stats returns task statistics
Backend: POST /tasks creates new task with checklist
Backend: GET /tasks/{task_id} returns task with activities and comments

Backend: DELETE /tasks/{task_id} removes task
Backend: POST /tasks/{task_id}/checklist adds checklist item
Backend: PUT /tasks/{task_id}/checklist/{item_id} toggles completion
Backend: POST /tasks/{task_id}/comments adds comment
Backend: GET /notifications returns notification list
Backend: GET /notifications/unread-count returns count
Backend: PUT /notifications/read-all marks all as read
Backend: Task with customer_id associates customer name
Backend: Task with order_id associates order number
Backend: Filter by status (pending, in_progress, completed)
Backend: Filter by priority (urgent, high, medium, low)
Backend: Search tasks by title/description
Backend: Pagination works correctly
Backend: Auth required for all endpoints (401 without session)
